item.description:
Look for me on the benches outside the main entrance of the Courtyard Cafe. I will have a meetup sign. We should meet at 6:30 so we can go in and have refreshments before the lecture.

https://sitn.hms.harv...

Description

Star Power: New Ways to Harvest Energy from our Sun

For those of you not familiar with SITN's lecture format, lectures are free, accessible, and open to the public. All lectures are given entirely by graduate students at Harvard and focus on hot topics in science research and news.

All lectures are on Wednesdays starting at 7 PM at the Armenise Amphitheater at Harvard Medical School. They are 2 hours in length, with a 10 minute break in between.

They will have light refreshments before the lecture (coffee, tea, cookies, etc.)

There is parking in the area, but it is expensive, for parking and general directions go to: https://sitn.hms.harv...

Longwood Parking Rates:

http://www.masco.org/...
item.name: Star Power: New Ways to Harvest Energy from our Sun
